A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: honestly.... I have to say I was disappointed. I expected so much going into that movie theater. I have seen it 5 times and each time I have tried to make myself love it for what it is... but it's just not good enough. I surely don't hate it but it had so much potential. it had its moments but it was just kinda bland overall. not one of my favorite star wars movies.
